00036 typedef void (*PFEVSYNC) (std::string name, uvm_object* data);
00037 
00038 class   uvm_event;
00039 typedef uvm_event *                          uvm_event_ptr;
00040 typedef std::map<std::string,uvm_event_ptr>  uvm_event_ptr_map;

00047 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 // Class: uvm_event
00049 //   Derived class of sc_event, adding data capabilities.
00050 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 class  uvm_event : public uvm_callback_agent<puvm_event>, public sc_core::sc_event
00052 {
00053     friend std::ostream & operator<< ( std::ostream &, const uvm_event & ); 
00054     friend  void Wait ( const uvm_event & ); 
00055     friend  bool Wait ( const sc_core::sc_time & , const uvm_event & ); 
00056 
00057 public:
00058     uvm_event(const std::string& name); 
00059 
00060 protected:  
00061 
00062     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063     // Destructor : uvm_event
00064     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065     virtual ~uvm_event() { }; 
00066 
00067 public:
00068     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069     // Function : get_name
00070     //  Returns name of uvm_event
00071     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     virtual const std::string & get_name() const { return m_name; };
00073 
00074     virtual void notify(uvm_object* obj);
00075 
00076     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077     // Function: wait
00078     //   Wait on uvm_event
00079     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080     void wait() { ::sc_core::wait(*this); };
00081 
00082 
00083     void wait_on();
00084     void wait_off();
00085     sc_core::sc_time get_trigger_time();
00086     bool is_on();
00087     bool is_off();
00088     virtual void reset();
00089 
00090     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091     // Function: get_data
00092     //   Returns notified data.
00093     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094     uvm_object* get_data() {return m_uvm_object;};
00095     static PFEVSYNC pfEventSync;
00096 
00097 protected:
00098     std::string         m_name;
00099     bool                m_notified;
00100     sc_core::sc_time    m_time;
00101     sc_core::sc_event   m_reset_event;
00102     uvm_object*         m_uvm_object;
00103 
00104     virtual void handle_callback();
00105     virtual void wait_notification();
00106 
00107 }; 
00108 
00109 typedef class uvm_pool<uvm_event> uvm_event_pool;
